sources.title: Fireheart (ADVENTURE FILM full length, adventure films German complete, full film German 2024)
Fireheart (HISTORIENABENTEUER ganzer Film Deutsch, Filme nach wahren Begebenheiten in voller Länge)

metadata.Plot: Sixteen-year-old Georgia Nolan dreams of being the world's first-ever female firefighter. When a mysterious arsonist starts burning down Broadway, New York's firemen begin vanishing. Georgia's father, Shawn, is called out of retirement by the Mayor of New York to lead the investigation into the disappearances. Desperate to help her father and save her city, Georgia disguises herself as a young man called "Joe" and joins a small group of misfit firefighters trying to stop the arsonist.
metadata.Writer: Laurent Zeitoun, Jennica Harper, Lisa Hunter
metadata.Actors: Alice Pol, Vincent Cassel, Valérie Lemercier
